examplePhrases: Alexa ask Wordpress facts for a fact
Alexa tell Wordpress facts to tell me trivia
en-US.name: Wordpress Facts
en-US.description:
Ask for Wordpress Facts, and learn about Wordpress.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Wordpress Facts" or "Alexa, open Wordpress Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
